original_title: Nando Viana: Da Turma do Fundão desde 1981
overview: “Da Turma do Fundão desde 1981” portrays the best stories of the humorist's entire career. It is, according to Nando Viana, a kind of autobiography, where he recalls facts from his school days, his adolescence, his parents and grandparents, the first jokes, his life in São Paulo, even the current problems.
title: Nando Viana: Da Turma do Fundão desde 1981
